catalysts.thesis: Positive Pre-NDA meeting minutes for AXS-12 (Narcolepsy) released on Dec 31 de-risk the imminent January 2026 filing. The market has not reacted due to the New Year's holiday.
catalysts.catalyst_details: NDA Submission for AXS-12 expected January 2026; Pre-NDA agreement confirmed Dec 31, 2025.
catalysts.absorption_status: News broke Dec 31 (New Year's Eve) amidst holiday low volume; markets closed Jan 1, leaving the catalyst completely unpriced.
catalysts.recency_proof: BioSpace Dec 31, 2025: AXSM confirms Pre-NDA agreement
catalysts.risk: Unexpected delay in actual January filing submission.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Zero price reaction to material regulatory progress due to holiday timing.

catalysts.thesis: TransCon CNP (Achondroplasia) PDUFA in Feb 2026. Stock has drifted since Nov 2025 delay, offering a discounted entry ahead of the final decision.
catalysts.absorption_status: Overshadowed by the 3-month review extension announced in Nov; price has stabilized but not run up yet.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Flat price action despite approaching blockbuster approval date.
